flawed_nl_solution:
There are 30 games total because 20 + 10 = <<20+10=30>>30
They need to win 90/2 games because 30 x (2/3) = <<30*(2/3)=90/2>>90/2
The need to win 33 more games because 90/2 - 12 = <<90/2-12=33>>33

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20, not 90/2. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
